summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and Seattle City Light; authorizing the Mayor to enter into and execute a supplemental agreement for financial assistance with the Washington State Department of Transportation for preliminary engineering in connection with the relocation of City-owned power distribution utilities as required by the State's I-90 Project (SR 90, Jct SR 5 to west shore Mercer Island); and authorizing the Director of Engineering and the Superintendent of Lighting to proceed with the preliminary engineering therefor.
